questions_1.question: The components of the fan rotor assembly have an "0" balance mark applied at assembly so that
Options: Fan blades can be maintained regularly
They can be reinstalled in the same position, which will prevent an imbalance
Shaft makes the fan blades move faster
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "They can be reinstalled in the same position, which will prevent an imbalance"
questions_1.partialFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

The valid answer is "They can be reinstalled in the same position, which will prevent an imbalance"
